Criminal news

In Novosibirsk, a 40-year-old man stabbed a saucer.

Police officers detained a suspect in the commission of a crime and prosecuted him

In Novosibirsk, the mother of the baby found in the trash can was detained.

Turns out the girl was giving birth to a baby in a rented apartment of one of the houses on the street of 1905, where she lived.

Novosibirska was accused of brutal murder against a cohabitant.

At the request of the investigating judge, the court ordered the accused to be remanded in custody.

Novosibirsk saved a newborn child dumped in the trash.

Investigators initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Killing a minor " , the circumstances of which are established

Novosibir Bonnie and Clyde were detained for burglary of food shops.

According to the Guardian Security Agency, at least 20 robberies account for a couple of raiders

Novosibirian will spend ten years in prison for arson by his sister.

The incident, which had barely ended the tragedy, took place on 14 April 2023 in Séléchtovka

Novosibir law enforcement officers caught the driver with lip documents.

A member of the Iskitim district GIBD stopped the motorists and asked for documents that had been identified as forgery

The Novosibirian went to another apartment and stole 30 kilos of copper wire

Also, the culprit took out the laptop, his bag and the schrupovart.

In Novosibirsk, the workshop manager was convicted of deception in the manufacture of a grave.

The killer was sentenced to 200 hours of compulsory work, and there was also material damage from her.

In Novosibirsk, the airport ' s taxi drivers were brought to trial.

The damage caused by malicious acts was about 400,000 roubles, which is now due to a sufficient number of evidence

In Novosibirsk, the accused was arrested in the looting of a police officer.

The accused will be under house arrest until 13 April 2024

In Novosibirsk, an ex-principal unit of the RCD served eight years in court for bribery.

In addition, the defendant must pay a fine just over 14 million roubles.

In Novosibirsk, a suspect extorted three million roubles.

According to the investigation, the man was the organizer of a criminal group that extorted 2,960,000 roubles from a trader in the Hilok market.

In Novosibirsk, they condemned the LPGs of producers and traders of forged alcohol.

In the case of men, criminal proceedings were initiated and investigated in 15 illegal cases.

In Novosibirsk, a 47-year-old guest cut the owner of the apartment and put a knife in his hand.

Law enforcement officers examined forensics, conducted investigative experiments and approximate rates

In the Novosibir region, the CNG of 12 will be condemned for attempting to sell drugs.

The accused took large quantities of proscribed substances that had been consumed by smaller ones, transported by regions where they were held secret.

In Novosibirsk, they'll judge a police officer who went on his leg.

Previously, the court granted the investigation ' s motion and ordered the accused to be remanded in custody.

The Novosibirian on the dating site invited a woman on a date and stole her.

The culprit has initiated criminal proceedings under the heading " Grabe " , now under a non-resident subscription.

In Novosibirsk, a robber of a similar section on the street and picked up his phone.

Suspect was apprehended, with regard to the figure, a non-resident subscription was used as a preventive measure.

In Novosibirsk, a 49-year-old woman threw a kitchen knife in a civilian husband

Police patrolmen apprehended and prosecuted a suspect in the commission of a crime

A 20-year-old hamster from Novosibirsk was detained for deception with a love vortex.

The suspect confessed to what had been done and undertook to compensate for the damages that had been inflicted on her under five years of imprisonment.

In Novosibir province, a drunk man attacked a knife on his companion.

The court found the perpetrator guilty and sentenced six and a half years ' imprisonment to serve in a special regime correctional colony

Novosibir police solved the case of garment fraud

From November 2022 to February 2023, young men posted public service announcements on social media and Internet services to sell the clothes of popular brands.

Novosibirs were sent to prison for two years and took the car for drunk driving.

It appeared that a man had already been tried for a similar violation and was deprived of his driver ' s license.

The Novosibirsk court recognized the ex-conpreter of the NMU as a briber and sentenced him

The court found Alevtin Shiskanov guilty and sentenced him to six months ' imprisonment.

A novosibir recidivist in a drunken fight killed a single village with a pancake.

A man killed a one-seller, after which he stole 11,000 roubles from her, and he was hiding.

Novosibir colony decided to tighten the punishment of a smashing girl

The colony administration requests that Victoria Urjumov ' s remaining term be held in the general regime colonies

Novosibir police officers have completed an investigation into the LNG case with prostitutes

The brothel owner has been arrested at home, and five other figures are under a non-resident subscription.

In Novosibirsk, the date of the trial was set for the explosion at the Lina Street house.

In Novosibirsk, the court begins a case of gas explosion in a residential building on the Lina Street, a tragedy occurred a year ago, 15 people died.

In Novosibirsk, they ordered a trial against the accused in the explosion of gas on the Lina Street.

The first trial in the Lina Street House Explosion case will take place on 20 February 2024

In Novosibirsk, a member of the Gerontological Centre was convicted of theft of 500,000

The court imposed a fine of 300,000 roubles.

In Novosibirsk, a foreigner is facing 20 years of colony for the establishment of a drug laboratory.

It is known that a foreign national has been in Russia ' s territory without a passport and a certificate.

In Novosibirsk, after the beating of two young hockey players on the boat, the case started.

The law enforcement officers have already conducted initial investigations and appointed forensic examinations

In Novosibirsk, a man who killed a 10-year-old pasoon was sentenced to 20 years.

In Novosibirsk, the court ruled on a resonant case, a story that took place two years ago, shocked many: a 10-year-old child died at the hands of a stepmother.

The court sentenced a new siber to 20 years in prison for the murder of a 10-year-old pasoon.

A half a million roubles in favour of the injured party are also recovered from the perpetrator.

The head of the CCR has commissioned a case for beating the boys on the Novosibirsk boat.

Law enforcement officers have to identify the circumstances that have contributed to the situation and take steps to address them.

RPK 2024 Novosibirsk
State Internet channel "Russia." Founder is a federal State unitary enterprise, the Russian State Television and Radio Broadcasting Company (GTRC). Editor-in-Chief of the GIC Rossia-Panina Elena Valerevna. STRK editor, Maxim Valerjevic Beborov. Tel. +7 (383) 314-60-00. E-mail: panorama@nsk.rfn.ru. All rights to materials published on the site are protected under Russian and international intellectual property legislation. Any use of text, photo, audio and video materials is possible only with the concurrence of the law holder (AGTRC). For children over 16 (16+).
